text: Pseudophilautus malcolmsmithi is a frog. Scientists have seen it in exactly one place: Sri Lanka. This frog is extinct. Every frog in this species is dead. Scientists believe that this is because human beings changed the places where the frog lived too much. One female frog was 14.9 mm long from nose to rear end. ==First paper== * ==References== Category:Frogs of Asia
title: Pseudophilautus malcolmsmithi
